name: Xenoperil: You Must Survive
description:
Lost on an alien planet, your only option, click to survive.

Controls: Click.

Gameplay: Click the current scene to complete an action but keep an eye on your health.

In this unfamiliar world, you must remain aware of your health, both physically and mentally. Gather water and hunt for food. Stay well rested and meditate for your own sanity. How long can you last?

This game was created for the Ludum Dare Game Jam with the theme "Combine 2 Incompatible Genres"

To follow the theme, we attempted to combine the genres Idle and Survival. Why? Because as they say… Make the simplest game and polish the heck out of it.
